resources.string:
v2.2.02-05
 There is a new "Alert Display Mode" in Call Detail Settings that determines how alert details are displayed. The default "Split Screen" will display call history and call details in a split screen in the landscape orientation. "Popup" is close to the clasic Cadpage alert display. "Full Screen" is what the original beta release did.
 
 New Locations:
 Gulf County, FL
 Williams County, OH
 Curry County, OR
 Williamsburg County, SC
 
 Location Fixes:
 Oldham County, KY
 Middlesex County, NJ
 Deschuttes County, OR
 Calhoun County, SC
 Hays County, TX

 v2.2.01-02

 General Fixes:
 Button configuration labels for "MORE INFO" and "CLOSE APP" were swapped.
 
 v2.2.01-01
 Complete rewrite of the settings menu to hopefully make it more logical.
 
 Expanded call detail window to cover entire screen.
 
 v2.1.12-01
 A new version of Cadpage will soon be available as a beta release. If you are interested in trying it out, sign up to be a Cadpage Beta Tester in the Play Store app.
